about_the_game:
What is "Broken Bonds"? 

Broken Bonds is a visual novel with a captivating detective storyline where every decision matters.

Key Features of the Game:

  • Gameplay duration: The first chapter offers up to 10 hours of gameplay, depending on your play style.

  • Replayability: In the first chapter, you can achieve five unique endings, one of which radically changes the plot of the next chapter.

  • Multiple protagonists: Experience the game’s events from different perspectives.

  • Choices with consequences: Every decision affects the story and the characters' fates, with some consequences becoming apparent throughout the entire playthrough.

  • Detective mechanics: Explore locations, analyze clues, take personal notes, and conduct interrogations through mini-games and specific interface elements.

  • Deep relationship system: Build relationships with other characters and shape their attitude toward you through your decisions.

About the game

The events unfold in a world that combines Victorian era with modern elements. You will play as a seasoned detective, William Beckett, investigating the case of genocide in the ducal house of "Gentry." Together with forensic intern Michelle Rouge, he becomes entangled in political intrigues that could lead to the complete destruction of the country.

The first chapter takes 7 hours to complete and offers five endings, one of which drastically changes the storyline of the next chapter. Gather evidence, take notes, conduct interrogations, and analyze the information to piece together the full picture of this ill-fated case.

Characters

In the game, you will meet numerous characters, each playing a role in the case, carrying their own secrets and the heavy burden of their past. Will you be able to uncover all their mysteries?

content_descriptors.notes: Mentions and images of graphic violence, fear of death, injuries.
